column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Since you all know to go to the Art Institute to see "American Gothic" and the myriad Monets
column2: here are some things you might not know - the Art Institute is a fantastic place for kids! The just-for-kids art exhibit in the basement of the Institute has actual works of art on display for young viewers
column3: teaching them how to read the art (what's going on in this Chinese scroll?) and how the pieces were created (what is a camera obscura?) I fell in love with the miniature rooms gallery
column4: too - you could spend hours gazing into these windows.
